body_html: We already support just passing values to initializer in get_variable, they just get passed over to tf.Variable, so you can, e.g., do tf.get_variable("x", initializer=0.5). I'd hope it'd work with tf.Tensor already, doesn't it?
body_text: We already support just passing values to initializer in get_variable, they just get passed over to tf.Variable, so you can, e.g., do tf.get_variable("x", initializer=0.5). I'd hope it'd work with tf.Tensor already, doesn't it?
body: We already support just passing values to initializer in get_variable, they just get passed over to tf.Variable, so you can, e.g., do tf.get_variable("x", initializer=0.5). I'd hope it'd work with tf.Tensor already, doesn't it?
